vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.17.25;
son of: Jether (H3500H) and Abigail (H0026H)
§ Amasa = "burden"
1) son of Ithra or Jether by Abigail the sister of David and general of the army of Absalom
2) son of Hadlai and a prince of Ephraim in the reign of king Ahaz
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Jéter y Abigail, hermana de David; jefe del ejército; (b)   jefe; tribu de Efraín; en tiempos del rey Ahaz
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞瑪撒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "負擔"
1) 以特拉(或作'益帖')和大衛的姐妹亞比該所生的孩子, 是押沙龍軍隊的元帥 (撒下 17:25)
2) 哈得萊的兒子, 以法蓮支派的貴族, 猶大王亞哈斯時代的人(代下 28:12)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚玛撒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "负担"
1) 以特拉(或作'益帖')和大卫的姐妹亚比该所生的孩子, 是押沙龙军队的元帅 (撒下 17:25)
2) 哈得莱的儿子, 以法莲支派的贵族, 犹大王亚哈斯时代的人(代下 28:12)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.28.12;
son of: Hadlai (H2311)
§ Amasa = "burden"
1) son of Ithra or Jether by Abigail the sister of David and general of the army of Absalom
2) son of Hadlai and a prince of Ephraim in the reign of king Ahaz
